REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F E f0849 reute r f BC-ASAMERA-<ASM>-TO-OFFE 03-20 0050

TEXT.TITLE: ASAMERA <ASM> TO OFFER THREE MLN SHARES
TEXT.BODY: Asamera Inc said it has agreed for Merrill Lynch and Co Inc's <MER> Merrill Lynch Canada Inc subsidiary to offer three mln Asamera common shares at 13.625 Canadian dlrs each, subject to all necessary U.S. and Canadian regulatory approval. Reuter
